name: Paint A Maze!
description:
Enjoy first time Mind puzzle shape filling game,follow the correct direction to color it. Smooth ball rolling to color the maze in specific time and unlock the new puzzle box.

Painting the maze puzzles, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square within short time.
Specific of this Paint in Maze you can play with one finger smoothly & easily.

New exciting Puzzle game with number of color balls that can addict you and release your depression in free mode play.

Paint A Maze Features:

Smooth Rolling Ball with number of Colors
Release stress and entertain with paint
Number of maze ready to color & pain it
Play this 2D Maze free game & forget about complicated 3D mazes
